item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-01
item.description: TikTok expands maximum video length to 10 minutes (3 minute read) TikTok has expanded the maximum length for uploads to 10 minutes.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-16
item.description: A first look at Microsoftâ€™s new Windows 11 Android apps support (3 minute read) Microsoft has released the first preview of its Android app support in Windows 11 to testers in the Windows Insider program.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-31
item.description: Tesla launches ‘TeslaMic,’ a microphone for in-car karaoke (2 minute read) Tesla has launched a microphone designed for its in-car karaoke system.
